hero.title: Afina DAO
hero.description: Afina DAO is a professional platform for crypto wallet management and automation: we host and support your wallets on our secure servers, run scripted activities in testnets and real projects to earn rewards, and provide 24/7 account monitoring.

management.title: Management and Hosting
management.description: We host and support your wallets on our secure servers, run scripted activities in testnets and real projects to earn rewards.

security.title: Data Security
security.description: Only trusted team members have access to funds and critical data; upon completion of cooperation, all client information is completely deleted from our servers.

monitoring.title: 24/7 Monitoring
monitoring.description: We provide round-the-clock monitoring of account status, tracking all processes and responding promptly to any changes.

automation.title: Process Automation
automation.description: For process automation, we use Afina — an antidetect browser with which we have an official partnership, increasing reliability and task execution speed.

partnership.title: Official Partnership with Afina
partnership.description: For process automation, we use Afina — an antidetect browser with which we have an official partnership, increasing reliability and task execution speed.

security.title: Security and Privacy
security.description: Only trusted team members have access to funds and critical data; upon completion of cooperation, all client information is completely deleted from our servers.

businessModel.title: Service Model
businessModel.description: Service on a monthly subscription model — rates depend on the number of accounts and project sets; individual terms, technical support, and reporting are available for corporate clients. Details and legal terms are on the 'About Afina DAO' page or in our commercial proposal upon request.

about.title: About Afina DAO
about.description: Detailed platform information and legal terms

common.welcomeDescription: Your comprehensive knowledge base for everything related to Afina DAO

about.title: Terms and Conditions of Service
about.description: Complete terms and conditions of service for Afina DAO

header.title: Terms and Conditions of Service
header.subtitle: Please read the terms carefully before starting cooperation

section1.title: 1. General Provisions
section1.point1: 1.1. The Organization provides turnkey project management services using UI scripts written on the Afina platform.
section1.point2: 1.2. The Organization does not guarantee receiving an airdrop from projects.

section2.title: 2. Rights and Obligations of the Organization
section2.obligation1: 2.1.1. Continuously monitor the operation of scripts.
section2.obligation2: 2.1.2. Update and add new scripts as new activities appear.
section2.obligation3: 2.1.3. Ensure maximum activity in the project ecosystem within its own choice.
section2.obligation4: 2.1.4. Provide an Afina license for the remote server free of charge.
section2.subtitle3: 2.3. The Organization has the right to:
section2.right1: 2.3.1. Independently determine the list of activities to perform.
section2.right2: 2.3.2. Consider additional proposals from the Client, but is not obliged to accept them.

section3.title: 3. Rights and Obligations of the Client
section3.obligation1: 3.1.1. Pay for the Organization's services in full at the beginning of the month.
section3.obligation2: 3.1.2. Bear the costs of proxies, remote server, social accounts (Discord, Twitter, etc.) and wallet funding.
section3.subtitle2: 3.2. The Client has the right to:
section3.right1: 3.2.1. Submit project proposals for consideration by the Organization.

section4.title: 4. Liability of the Parties
section4.subtitle1: 4.1. The Organization is not responsible for:
section4.notResponsible1: 4.1.1. Suspension or termination of project activities.
section4.notResponsible2: 4.1.2. Non-payment of airdrop by the project.
section4.notResponsible3: 4.1.3. Actions requiring KYC completion or airdrop claiming.
section4.point2: 4.2. The Client accepts the risk of project termination in case of its suspension.
section4.point3: 4.3. Funds paid by the Client for services are non-refundable.

section5.title: 5. Payment for Services
section5.point1: 5.1. The cost of services is calculated based on the number of accounts and projects.
section5.point2: 5.2. The price can be determined on the Organization's website, clarified in the Afina DAO chat, or with representatives @acycas / @kirjeyy.
section5.point3: 5.3. Payment is made monthly, at the beginning of the month, and is non-refundable.

contact.title: Contacts
contact.subtitle: For cooperation inquiries, please contact our representatives on Telegram

pricingPage.title: Pricing Calculator
pricingPage.description: Specify the number of accounts and projects to calculate the cost of using the platform
pricingPage.firstMonthInfo: First month: includes installation cost ($100 per project) + monthly subscription
pricingPage.subsequentMonthsInfo: Subsequent months: only monthly subscription without installation cost
pricingPage.discountsInfo: Discounts: automatically applied when the number of projects increases
pricingPage.newProjectsInfo: New projects: when adding a new project, an additional installation fee ($100) is charged
pricingPage.specifyParameters: Specify parameters to calculate the cost
